verses.text_plain: Unto thee will I cry, O Lord my rock; be not silent to me: lest, if thou be silent to me, I become like them that go down into the pit.
verses.verse_html:
1Unto thee will I cry, O Lord my rock; be not silent to me: lest, if thou be silent to me, I become like them that go down into the pit. ▼
▼ to me: Heb. from me

footnotes.body_html: ▼ to me: Heb. from me

verses.text_plain: Hear the voice of my supplications, when I cry unto thee, when I lift up my hands toward thy holy oracle.
verses.verse_html:
2Hear the voice of my supplications, when I cry unto thee, when I lift up my hands toward thy holy oracle. ▼
▼ thy…: or, the oracle of thy sanctuary

tokens.text: unto thee, when I lift up

footnotes.body_text: ▼ thy…: or, the oracle of thy sanctuary
footnotes.body_html: ▼ thy…: or, the oracle of thy sanctuary

verses.text_plain: Draw me not away with the wicked, and with the workers of iniquity, which speak peace to their neighbours, but mischief is in their hearts.
verses.verse_html: 3Draw me not away with the wicked, and with the workers of iniquity, which speak peace to their neighbours, but mischief is in their hearts.

verses.text_plain: Give them according to their deeds, and according to the wickedness of their endeavours: give them after the work of their hands; render to them their desert.
verses.verse_html: 4Give them according to their deeds, and according to the wickedness of their endeavours: give them after the work of their hands; render to them their desert.

verses.text_plain: Because they regard not the works of the Lord, nor the operation of his hands, he shall destroy them, and not build them up.
verses.verse_html: 5Because they regard not the works of the Lord, nor the operation of his hands, he shall destroy them, and not build them up.

tokens.text: them, and not build them up

verses.text_plain: Blessed be the Lord, because he hath heard the voice of my supplications.
verses.verse_html: 6Blessed be the Lord, because he hath heard the voice of my supplications.

verses.text_plain: The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped: therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; and with my song will I praise him.
verses.verse_html: 7The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped: therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; and with my song will I praise him.

tokens.text: in him, and I am helped

verses.text_plain: The Lord is their strength, and he is the saving strength of his anointed.
verses.verse_html:
8The Lord is their strength, and he is the saving strength of his anointed. ▼
▼ their: or, his
 , ▼
▼ saving…: Heb. strength of salvations

footnotes.body_html: ▼ saving…: Heb. strength of salvations

verses.text_plain: Save thy people, and bless thine inheritance: feed them also, and lift them up for ever.
verses.verse_html:
9Save thy people, and bless thine inheritance: feed them also, and lift them up for ever. ▼
▼ feed: or, rule

tokens.text: them also, and lift them up
